20401.name: Import Roblox Studio Themes
20401.description:
Programmatically import Roblox Studio theme colours to your project as Colour Styles.


This plugin is by no means optimised or well-written, so expect some delay while colours are imported, and perhaps the occasional bug (Figma plugins are hard! :/)

19127.name: Wantedly Preflight
19127.description:
Wantedly Preflight is a Figma plugin that validates your project satisfies the rules of the design system of Wantedly.


Features

  •  Validation ― You can check whether the node is valid just by running the plugin. The result will come out with a detailed message and you can jump into fixing it immediately with a focus button.
  •  Configurable ― Wantedly Preflight has 6+ sophisticated rule and all of them are well-tested. However, in case if you would like to opt-out of some of the rule in your project, you can independently configure items to enable.
  •  Ignore ― Exceptions are always there. On the result page, you have a check button to ignore the specific node. After you ignored a node, it will always be considered appropriate regardless of whether it violates our rules or not.


Our Design System

See Wantedly UI Components

20955.name: Composer
20955.description:
Mail-merge type of plugin. Generate personalized PDFs with Google Sheets


### Note / How-to Use

- Make sure to generate your own Google Sheets-scoped API key so you can access your Google Sheet file

- Make sure your Google Sheet file is visible to anyone with the link (not limited to people added)

- Headers will always be on the first row

 - They can only be alphanumeric, with dashes, and underscores

- Make sure a frame layer is selected

- Make sure to insert `%%{header name}%%`on your text, the plugin will loop over the text layers under the selected frame

- Only Text layer is supported at the moment


### If you're having problems or want something to be better feel free to open an issue!

20362.name: Jump
20362.description: In the Figma plug-in, you can move instantly to the specified frame.

20406.name: Transpose
20406.description:
A simple plugin to flip any selected layers size.


ProTip : Set a custom keyboard shortcut to lauch the plugin and speed up your transposition process



check this lil figmatips on twitter : https://twitter.com/DavidWilliames/status/1169053934243069952?s=20

21106.name: DiceBear Exporter
21106.description:
With this plugin you can export your creations for DiceBear Avatars in no time.


1. Create components for the different parts of your avatar according to the pattern "group/name".

2. Place at least one component on a frame with identical height and width.

3. Select the frame, open the plugin, enter your avatar style information and export your work.


Further documentation:

avatars.dicebear.com

20512.name: Localiser
20512.description:
Localiser gives you the ability to translate the text elements to another one by importing the translations from google sheets. 


You can export all the text elements from current page to a csv file. 

Use the spreadsheet link to import the spreadsheet data to your plugin, which then displays the available languages. (Languages added in the sheet will be picked up. Check the example of sheet below)

On selecting the language, the text elements will change to the new text provided in the sheet. 


What your google sheet should contain:

  1. id's of the text elements of the figma page. (Column 1)
  2. Current language text. (Column 2)
  3. New language converted text. (Rest of the Columns)


id | English | Hindi | Tamil

1:39 | All Subjects | सभी विषयों | அனைத்து பாடங்களும்

.

.

.... so on and so forth.

20431.name: Frame to Component
20431.description: Easy way to convert Frames to components

20937.name: Handy Components
20937.description:
Remember creating a calendar? Adding 31 labels for dates and labeling each one, and then there are week days and a month... There are components, that are just to laborious to make each time for a new project. 


Handy components is a Figma plugin to instantly drop useful components straight on to your canvas with full auto layout support, variants and mimicking styles from your file coming soon.

21197.name: Pikaso
21197.description:
Determining the colours can be the most challenging thing to start a project, especially a project that begins only based on the logo provided by the client.


We believe that projects that start earlier will result in more explorable findings.


With current technology we can access the colour data on the picture. Combine that with simple and yet powerful AI algorithm to extract the right accurate colours.


With Pikaso, we hope that it can be a solution for everyone to start something faster and more efficiently.

21114.name: Advanced Contrast
21114.description: Create accessible color combinations that look good using Advanced Perceptual Contrast Algorithm (APCA) – the future-proof way to check how contrast is really seen by humans.

21115.name: Sizze
21115.description:
Create app prototype and instantly export it to React Native code.


We developed the plugin so that sizze.io platform users could use the service even more efficiently and create quality pages in compliance with all modern requirements to the app code.


Some of our features include:


Auto Layout

All components assembled in Auto Layout mode turn into elements that are easy to use for building dynamic lists and connecting backends.


Constraints 

We have developed algorithms to adapt layouts for all application screens. Just add the constraints property, and you will see how easy it is.


Scroll and grid 

Create dynamic content directly from your prototypes. All you need to do is write properties to elements, and you'll get results without any coding.


You can also turn your design into real functional components (Tab bar, Nav Bar, Segment Control, Text Field, Radio Button, Toogle, Dropdown) or take advantage of connecting data from Firebase to your layouts with our algorithms. Learn more.


Easy coding with Sizze!

21045.name: Vizard -> Design handoff for marketers
21045.description:
Vizard → Design Handoff for Marketers

Join the top brands & agencies using Vizard to scale their creatives.


✅ Handoff ✅ Personalization at scale ✅. Creative Automation


Designers

Look, we know your time is precious!

You never really like talking to the marketing fellas, do you? They want you to center-align a triangle in a circle, they don't really know what a visual center is!


Vizard lets you keep control of design guidelines while saving you all the time of doing back & forth with marketers.


You already handled the developers with Figma/Zeplin, good job! 👏 Marketers are your last nail in the coffin. This is your true fire & forget!


Features

  • Handoff designs to other stakeholders while keeping your Figma designs intact
  • Seamlessly collaborate with marketers
  • Save your precious time by doing things ONCE!


Now, please skip the next section. Promise?


Marketers

Here is our little secret - We really made Vizard for you! Sssshhh..! We are giving you control to own your assets & the freedom to make unlimited versions of them without bothering the designers. No need to learn a design software & yet be able to generate thousands of variations, on-brand!


Features

  • Scale your design workflow
  • Generate unlimited variations without involving designers
  • No need for design knowledge or extra training


How to use

  1. Sign-up on https://studio.vizardapps.com
  2. Install Vizard Figma Plugin
  3. Select the Frame that you would like to share with the marketing team, run the plugin
  4. (First time only) Click on 'Connect Vizard'. It will open authorization page in browser. Click on 'Authorize Figma'
  5. If the preview looks good, click 'Send to Vizard'. That's it!
  6. The design will be available to you & your marketing team under Your Templates on https://studio.vizardapps.com


Known issues & limitations

  • Mixed styling in text is currently not supported
  • Currently, only Google fonts are supported. All non-google fonts are converted to Fira Sans font
  • Figma Arrow elements get imported as straight lines
  • Only outside stroke is supported. Inside & center strokes get converted to outside strokes


For questions & suggestions, please reach out to us at hello@vizardapps.com


Learn more about Vizard at www.vizardapps.com

21103.name: Figsplosion
21103.description:
Press a button and “explode” (move and rotate) the frames currently in view.


Great for letting off steam on a hard design, getting a co-workers attention or just playing around!


Have fun with it!

21154.name: Remix Icon
21154.description:
Remix Icon is a set of open-source neutral-style system symbols elaborately crafted for designers and developers.


This is not an official plugin, I just love the project and wanted to help out


Website: https://remixicon.com/


This plugin is open source: https://github.com/milos5593/figma-plugin-remix-icons

21135.name: Formalist
21135.description:
Check your designs for mistakes


Plugin looks for:

1. Fonts less than 12px

2. Fractional coordinates

3. Fractional size

4. Default names


Contact us to buy a license with 5+ more checks

21028.name: MP Asset Generator
21028.description:
This plugin allows you to update the styles and logos of Marriage Pact assets to reuse your design for other colleges. Aside from creating two components and changing paint styles, this plugin will not mutate your Figma file in any way.


Colors

Your file should already have color styles with a hierarchy relatively like "[Print/Digital/Text] > [Primary/Secondary]". If not, clicking any colored square should initialize them with the appropriate brand colors.


Logo

When clicking "Update Logo", the plugin looks for the group "Logos/Editable Digital Logo" on the first page and creates (or updates) the components "Digital Logo" and "Print Logo", which are scalable copies of whatever lies in Editable Digital Logo.


If your file doesn't have any such component, "Update Logo" will display an error in the plugin, and no action will be taken.


---

If you have any questions, feel free to contact jerryh2@stanford.edu.
